mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL , article_no , parent_no , LPAD(' ', 4 * (LEVEL-1)) || title AS title , content , write_date , id FROM t17_board START WITH parent_no = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR article_no = parent_no ORDER SIBLINGS BY article_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t17_board (article_no, parent_no, title, content, image_file_name, id) VALUES (#{articleNo}, #{parentNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageFileName}, #{id})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t17_board WHERE article_no IN ( SELECT article_no FROM t17_board START WITH article_no = #{articleNo} CONNECT BY PRIOR article_no = parent_no )
mapper.select: SELECT article_no FROM t17_board START WITH article_no = #{articleNo} CONNECT BY PRIOR article_no = parent_no
